## QueryStateConfig.triggers property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
triggers?: false | {
        focusTrigger?: boolean;
        onlineTrigger?: boolean;
        timerTrigger?: boolean | number;
        customTriggers?: Observable<unknown>[];
    };
```
